summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 44E, Page 177 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 14, Hill Tract Addition to the City of Seattle, Supplemental Plat from BC, CG and RM 800 to RMV 200, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (C.F. 287409, Petition of Department of Community Development).
